page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content:
POPULATION ORIGINS OF PEOPLE
The Newtown is the largest part of Hatfield and has only developed since the l950's. We thought it would be interesting to hold a survey to find where the people in Newtown originated. We sent a questionaire to 6 other Junior schools in the area. We asked where their parents and grandparents were born. 469 children took part. Here are the results:-
66% of children were born here l4% of parents were born here 26% of parents were born in London 45% were born elsewhere in England 725 parents were interviewed 942 grandparents were asked, only l2% were born in Hatfield 8% of parents and grandparents were born in another country. We concluded
